law.catch_line: Motor carriers shall comply with city and urban-county traffic rules and regulations.
law.text: Every motor carrier operating under a certificate or permit issued by the Department of Vehicle Regulation shall observe traffic rules and regulations of each city and each urban-county while operating therein.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 24, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 20(2); and ch. 142, sec. 3, effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 39, effective June 15, 1950.
